title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Every suspect revealed as Mercedes is shot and left to die
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures/Metro.co.uk)

Mercedes McQueen (Jennifer Metcalfe) has had an incredibly tough year thus far in Hollyoaks, but things are set to get much worse for the young woman in autumn, as she finds herself the target of an unknown shooter, and will be left for dead in the middle of The Loft’s dance floor.

It’s safe to say that Mercedes has been to hell and back this past year. Between battling a drug habit, to knocking down Grace (Tamara Wall) during a joyride with Liam (Jude Monk McGowan) — not to mention her marital problems with Sylver (David Tag) which certainly weren’t helped by the summer affair she embarked on with Liam — she’s had to cope with a lot of stress as of late, but things are set to get much worse.

Yes, after a huge row breaks out in The Dog, Mercedes retreats to the The Loft, where she finds herself all alone. While partying on the dance floor, someone will pull the trigger and leave her for dead.

The question on everyone’s lips, of course, is who is the mystery shooter?

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

This incident will kick-off a long-running mystery storyline, as viewers try and work out who it was that left Mercedes for dead. Goldie (Chelsee Healey) will be determined to get the bottom of things also and — given that she’s proven incredibly good at detective work via her investigation into Breda’s (Moya Brady) odd behaviour —she could well prove successful in uncovering the truth.

As noted earlier, Mercedes has had an awful year, and her actions throughout the past couple of months have had a negative effect on several of the village’s residents. The question is: which one of them would be capable of leaving the McQueen matriarch for dead?

The suspects Sylver McQueen

Grace Black

Liam Donovan

Diane Hutchinson

Joel Dexter

Breda McQueen

James Nightingale

Could Grace Black perhaps uncover the truth that it was, in fact, Mercedes who knocked her down and thus seek revenge?

Or will Sylver find out about his wife having cheated on him with Liam?

Considering all the heartache Mercedes has caused, it’s certainly going to be incredibly difficult trying to work out who exactly is responsible.
